abstract.t: Network Address Translation is a technique for reducing thecomplexity of address re-assignment. It can also lead to a reductionin the routing state in the core.This draft is about using the technique for the same reasons formulticast. The approach is complementary to IP-in-IP tunnels formulticast, but avoids the overhead of encapsulation. It has the samestate setup requirements at the edges, as does NAT.
